title: Ep. 762 Yesterday’s Bombshell Hearing
description:
Summary: 
In this episode I address the explosive takeaways from yesterday’s Spygate hearing on Capitol Hill. 
 
News Picks:
Here are some key takeaways from Peter Strzok’s testimony of Capitol Hill. 
 
Read this piece about the outrageous comments from a Democrat lawmaker about Strzok.
 
This piece is proof that the existence of the Trump team investigation was leaked to the press. 
 
This liberal running for governor in Michigan can’t even explain his own proposals. 
 
Incredible revelations about the infiltration of Hillary’s illicit email system.
